long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI based Chrome extension for parsing Loads from an email and amazon Relay and sending the data to Datatruck which  is a browser-based AI transportation management system.

AI based (TruckGPT) Chrome extension for parsing loads from an email and Amazon Relay trips and sending the data to Datatruck  which is a browser-based AI TMS that can be used to extract data from an email documents and Amazon Relay trips and automatically send it to Datatruck  for storage and analysis. With this extension, users can quickly and easily reconcile, edit and copy their trip/load details and the associated data, such as start and end points, duration, and route taken. This data can then be used to monitor and analyze trends in trips, helping users make informed decisions about how to optimize their trips. Additionally, the extension can be used to identify and analyze customer behavior, such as what routes are being used and why.
